EmailTemplate.name: Case Close Onboarding EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Ready to take off with orderbird?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You are ready to take off!
You made it to the end of your onboarding, what a great journey!
Together we customised your register to your every need and discovered everything orderbird can do to let your business take flight.
Thank you from Berlin!
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} from orderbird
Want to tell us how it was?
Don't worry! We won't leave you hanging!
Your Customer Data
